review_text: Very spacious and comfortable couch!! Very comfortable!!!
Lovely loft in the heart of Luverne. Very walkable to restaurants, parks, and museums. Our hosts were very nice and met us with the key and showed us around.
Great stay for our group of 4. Very spacious and clean. Good launching point to nearby brewery or state park.
Nice quiet place downtown with plenty of space.
We came for hiking around the area- was nice and central for where we were going. Clean and spacious home.
the space is LARGE! clean, and artsy,

our plane got in at 930pm and we still needed our car rental and the a 30 minute drive to our airbnb.
so we got there at 1030 at night. They were were very nice about the late hour, and showed is around. They even called around to see if there was anywhere to eat since it was so late.
We loved our stay! The space was so spacious. Our teen boys loved the huge couch & eclectic art. It felt like we were in our own gallery. We definitely wish we could have stayed longer.
Great space with amazing artwork. Excellent location near restaurants s a nd brewery - would definitely stay again!
Rented the unit for our family. Very clean, large and well stocked. Decor is fabulous. Lots of room. Nicole was very pleasant to work with. Great rental.
This was a great space!
Wonderful space! We will be back!
Will stay here again! Have family in town and a great place to stay while visiting.

What a great place to stay! And amazing hosts to go with it! The apartment location was convenient, and within walking distance of everything we wanted, including Take 16 Brewery! This was such a fun and contemporary space! And so spacious too! Our group will be back!

I loved having Nicole as a host! She was very accommodating. I always love staying here, my girlfriends and I had a wonderful time. We are hoping to make her bnb our annual get together spot so we can be near our families but have 'me time', too!

This place is a gem! Great location. Nice spot if driving through MN. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating. Met at arrival (we arrived around 10pm). The place is huge, clean, and was much more than what was expected in the description (as a great thing). The beds were very comfortable and the bedding was quality. Definitely one of the nicer AirBNBs i’ve been to and the price was very reasonable! Would stay here again if going through!

This is a wonderful place! The price is so good and you can enjoy the whole room with friends. Although we arrived late, Kevin was still friendly to welcome us and introduce all facilities. If I visit this town again, I definitely will live here again.

The loft is huge and welcoming. We appreciated the opportunity to stretch out! Having four beds in two rooms gave us all the opportunity to get a good night's sleep. There are indoor stairs to reach the loft, as described, but they were manageable for us. No issues with parking in the alley in the back. Decent pizza directly across the street, groceries a block away, and an excellent morning coffee shop walkable two doors away.
This unique apartment is centrally located. Nicole was an excellent host with easy to access instructions. The apartment was well laid out and has a chill, relaxing vibe.
Such a great location right on Main Street! Very spacious and really cool place, would highly recommend!
The place was a great find and was very spacious! We'll look to stay here again!
There were 4 of us, plenty of room and fit our needs perfectly, would definitely recommend and would book again. We were in the area for the races at Husets, easy access and close.
Really cool space! Bottom outside door dies not lock, but not uncommon for a small town. Our host's dog became lonely while they were out Sunday morning. We had a bit of dog music for a while.🙂

Four of us stayed here and we all loved it! Clean and very spacious! We loved the decor - lots of fun art! Great location on Main street so within walking distance of a lot of things. We ate at a great restaurant just down the block and in the other direction on the same block there is a coffee shop. Great spot to jump off to surrounding attractions. Would highly recommend!

The place was very beautiful and stylish. Located downtown and within walking distance of all the best restaurants and shops. Host was very friendly and responsive. This is definitely a great pick to stay if you are in town to see the local sights or even crash after a long drive.

This spacious two-bedroom puts the space in spacious. Airy and filled with light, it has a wonderful ambiance. Big living room with a huge sectional on which a dozen people could sit comfortably. We did not spend much time in the kitchen, but it's well-appointed and clean. The two bedrooms are large - and, yes, spacious - with the most (and best organized) closet space I have ever seen in an Airbnb. The beds and pillows are very comfy; the bed linens are new and top-rate.
It's easy to see two couples or a family with kids enjoying Nicole's place.
The decor is artistic, creative, tasteful and interesting. I sincerely believe that you will never find an Airbnb with as many books and such a wide variety of books. You could study for a degree in art history - if you had enough time.
Good location - right on Main Street in the quaint downtown of Luverne. Off-street parking in the back.
Only caveat... Lots of stairs to climb.
Our stay was great. Place was as advertised and the hosts where very helpful and responsive. Will stay again if in the area.

Great place to stay if you are visiting Luverne! This art inspired loft was perfect for 5 hockey girls going to the rink everyday! They loved coming back to the welcoming accommodations to relax at the end of a hard day!! Being right on Main Street, we walked to coffee and the theatre is across the street! So fun exploring Luverne’s quiet, quaint town. The hosts are so fast to respond and live near by, so meeting us when we arrived was so convenient and having a tour of the place with the host was a nice touch!! Highly recommend this loft apartment!
Very clean, spacious, and quiet. We enjoyed the artistic space and the hospitality of the hosts.
Amazing, clean, quiet and comfortable spot. They were incredibly accommodating. Definitely recommend.

Such a lovely space, open concept design in the living room/kitchen that’s very relaxing with a great space to play a game of chess or read a book from the shelf. The bedrooms are great for a group of four adults, very comfortable. The hosts are lovely, very personable and full of great recommendations for the area! Highly recommend!
Great place to stay! Highly recommend!

Though we only stayed for one night, the place was clean and really cool. The check-in was a bit different than I was used to, but they were very responsive and it went smoothly. The location worked great for us and I would for sure recomend staying here.

We couldnt have asked for a better place to stay on our way out to South Dakota. Our kids loved it so much that they were disappointed that we only stayed one night. The decor was artistic and beautiful. Looked better than the pictures! We would highly recommend this place to anyone- family friendly, bigger space than we expected and it was cleaner than clean! We give it 6 stars!
Loved this space! Great spot, and very spacious. Super hosts, and right downtown. We will be back.
We had a one night stay and it worked perfectly for us. Convenient location and spacious.

This a huge, modern space, you'll love staying here. By the time we arrived, one of the beds was updated to a queen size, so my wife and I were able to enjoy that while our teenage kids use the full size beds. Great value for the size of the apartment. It was nice to play the provided guitars in the evenings as well.
Loved staying here. Luverne is a beautiful town and I really feel like I had the perfect spot to enjoy it from. The hosts are wonderful and gracious.
This is a gem of a place to stay! Close to everything and great decor. We will definitely book again if in the area.

We can’t rate our experience high enough. It was such a great place in the middle of a cute little town. Great location - right between a coffee shop and yummy restaurant. Apartment was so nice and comfortable. We would totally stay there again.
Nicole’s place was incredibly spacious with lots of unique artwork and books. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend it!

Nicole’s place was a very sweet stay, they responded timely to all our communications, were welcoming and so helpful. A great place to rest and recharge in our long journey. The kids loved it. Comfortable and super clean, very beautiful and full of sweet details. I recommend this place if you are visiting. Centrally located, great food around, the cafe in the corner was great too for breakfast. Very beautiful, my family loved it! I hope we can come back with more time.
Clean, welcoming space! Wonderful artistic touches - loved the color coordinated books! we were only able to stay one night but wish we had had more time!

Great location- one block from cute coffee shop and from an excellent restaurant, 4 blocks from brewery. Spacious and comfortable. Great stop in Lucerne to break up our drive home from Black Hills, SD.
Such an adorable place. Very clean
The space was exactly what we needed - a large living area and kitchen, and spacious bedrooms. We really enjoyed the art work and books in the space too!
This place was wonderful. Right in the heart of downtown, near restaurants, very clean, and fabulous air conditioning! Check in was a breeze. Would definitely stay again.
High ceilings and plenty of beds! The place was stylish and spacious, perfect for our family traveling through. Worth it.
Nicole’s place is amazingly beautiful. Giant windows, high ceilings and beautiful design elements. I highly recommend it!
Stylish loft, hidden gem in a small town. Fantastic hosts!

Kevin and Nicole went above and beyond any expectations that I may have had going into the apartment. The pictures really don't do the space justice as it is MUCH bigger than it looks in the pictures. We are a family of 8 and we had plenty of space for all of us. Only having one bathroom could be challenging for us, but we made it work. We had one minor issue and Nicole took care of that right away. They were quick to respond to any need or question. I look forward to staying there. The art work is beautiful, the book shelves are stocked with so many choices, and our hosts were amazing! If I could give them six stars I would. You won't be disappointed if you stay in the apartment!

My favorite AirBNB stay. The apartment is beautifully decorated, furniture and beds very comfortable. Location was great to walk around a quaint town, enjoy dinner and a beer at the local brewery. We were just passing thru, but was a perfect restful stop. Highly recommend.
This place is superb, and beautiful!
Great place. Brought back memories of the small town i grew up in
Very fun place to stay!
Small town hospitality and perfect place for touring the area. Very friendly and helpful hosts.
Host made sure the apartment was freshly cleaned prior to our arrival. The apartment is a beautiful space and larger than I was expecting.
Beautiful modern apartment space! Loved the art pieces and decor.
Spacious and lovely. You will not be disappointed.

We've stayed at Nicole's place a few times and it doesn't disappoint. It's quiet, comfortable, and spacious. There are art books and artwork throughout the apartment. And there's a few guitars on the wall for the musically inclined. We really enjoy being able to stay there when we visit Luverne.

We LOVED staying in Nicole's loft! I hosted a 'mom's night in' and invited a dozen friends over for a get together. Everyone was so impressed with the space! We will absolutely be staying here again. The space is cool and contemporary, yet incredibly inviting. Thanks again!!
Beautiful apartment with an ideal proximity to shopping and restaurants. Far surpassed our expectations.
Hosts were very communicative, flexible, and have a wonderfully unique place that you simply must visit to experience! Many, many thanks!
Facility is exactly as pictured! Host were very accommodating with our ever changing arrival times.
Loved the decor. Comfy beds. Neat as a pin. Nicole was quick to meet us. Great place to stay
Very clean and comfortable.
We loved this place. It's larger than the pictures appear, which was much appreciated for my family of 8. Trendy and ecclectic styling with small touches such as mints and tips on local attractions.

Luvene is a small town close to Sioux Fall and right by Freeway-90: the house is literally 3min from the free way, making it a convenient place to stop for the night. This unit is on the second floor of an old brick house in the downtown. There is parking place at the back of the building. Despite of aged appearance of the building from outside, inside it was very neatly kept. This 2 bd/1 ba unit is tastefully decorated and full of character. The host family took great care of the place, and responded promptly to our questions. My family enjoyed our one night stay there. One comment though: because of the age of the house, "old house smell“ could be an issue in some poorly vented corner, such as the storage closet for linen and cleaning item. Most of my family did not seem to notice, but I may have a more sensitive nose and sensed the lingering smell.
This place was great! Lots of space, comfy, private with lots of great places within walking distance that we could go to if we wanted to venture out. We would definitely stay there again!

The pictures don’t really show how nice this apartment is. Everything is a couple notches above what you would expect from the listing! Great communication with Nicole. I totally recommend this place!
everything was great!
Great place for a family gathering!
Nice place to stay, roomy +clean apartment. Nicole is friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend it.
Good people who care to provide a relaxed environment.

Great location and lots of space that my family enjoyed! Unique apartment with unique artwork. Our host suggested Pipestone National Monument and my family loved climbing all over the rocks there and the history. There is a yummy restaurant right next door that was perfect after a couple long hot days enjoying the outdoors. Could have been cleaner, but from the other comments, I think this is normally not the case.

We stayed two nights here. Nicole accommodates your needs, just need to ask with her. She responds super fast. Check in was super easy. The place is sparkling clean. Pictures show exact rooms. Two bedroom are separated by the bathroom. Normal noises in one room does not affect the other bedroom. We had kids sleep in the bed room while we were in the living space that has a door as well. No one lives during the night below this level (there are shops/businesses.)
Location is a cool Main Street. City park is pretty big/amazing for little kids and we did some grilling there. State park is very close from here.
Each one of us were pleased with this stay. Did i forget to say the loft is spacious? And yes, you can park 3 SUVs or cars in the back parking area. If yours are the trucks, two will fit without any issues. We parked three SUVs there. We will certainly stay again if we happen to pass through this area in future.
Amazing Place

Family of 6 stayed for an overnight here. Nicole has a great, clean and spacious loft with a neat artistic atmosphere. It was a relaxing and comfortable stay. Cool main street location. Everything was super easy.

This was our second time staying at Nicole and Cody's apartment and we loved it just as much as the first. It's the perfect place to stay while enjoying all of the great things in Luverne - could not recommend it more highly!
Very nice place. Big and very clean.
Great place! Fun space and great location! My friends and I loved it

I used this apartment for my friend's bachelorette party, and it was fantastic! Everyone was commenting on how much they loved the space. Also, Nicole and her family were so hospitable and helpful from giving tips to taking a couple pictures of our group. It was perfect!
Comfy and stylish place. Great stay!
Nicole was an awesome hostess. The apt is super clean, stylish and comfortable. I will absolutely stay here on my return trips to Luverne.
Awesome place to stay!
Great space with comfortable sleeping arraignments. The loft has a wow factor when you first walk in! Wonderful place to stay for a short or long period.
This is a very nice space in downtown Luverne. Nicole is very responsive, the space was just as advertised, and totally met our needs for our short stay.

Great hospitality! Nicole is very friendly and attentive. She was quick with her responses and catered to our needs. Nicole went above and beyond. The apartment is very spacious. Love the vibe of the living room. Good location in the heart of downtown, within walking distance of lots of great destinations. Would recommend this apartment and host.
Great space, great location, lovely small town charm. Thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of our stay. Awesome hosts!
It was nice place for family trip.
Great communication! Beautiful spacious apartment. Cute decor. Definitely recommend!
Great accommodation! We loved staying there for the night!

Luverne, MN is a gem. I could easily take a vacation in this town. It is like Maybury from the Andy Griffith show where everyone is kind and considerate. The apartment we stayed in Unit D was tastefully decorated though we did cover one picture that my son deemed scary. 12ft ceilings and high quality everything made it so much nicer than any hotel stay. As long as you can take stairs U recommend it. A working 100 year old theater is across the street and coffee shops and a grocery store made this feel like home. I highly recommend.
Awesome place with great hosts. Will definitely return.

What a great space! Only two of us stayed here but there is ample room for two couples or even two small families. The high ceilings along with a sort of minimalist decor really make the space feel grand. There are books and DVDs available to entertain you, if needed. The location is wonderful, right on the main street. Next door is Sterling's Café and Grille which was perfect with their sidewalk seating for enjoying the beautiful evenings with a glass of wine (or local beer), the food was good as well. Nicole and family were very kind and friendly, and easily accessible. I would certainly recommend this spot.
Nicole was fabulous! Great communication. She was flexible and worked with us checking in a little later than planned. Very Nice place!

This is a spectacular apartment in the heart of Luverne on Main Street! We loved staying here while in town for a family celebration - it was perfect in every way. Can't recommend Nicole's apartment highly enough and we'll definitely be back again!

Loved the location! Walking distance to everything downtown and the park. I especially enjoyed the nice kitchen ware for cooking, nice pots and pans, knives etc. The loft was stylish, and Netflix and a number of good DVD’s was available. Would definitely stay at again!!
Great place to stay! It’s clean and a very neat apartment to stay in. Definitely recommend it
Very spacious and comfy space, wonderful kind hosts! Would absolutely stay here again :)
Comfortable, clean, very nice place. Groceries a block away. Friendly town and people.

Very nice, clean and spacious! Nicole was very kind and offered suggestions to us for places to eat, etc. The amenities were perfect for our party of 7! Love the open kitchen, dining and living room! We will definitely stay again if we ever go through there again!

Dear Debby
Thank you so much for letting us stay at your beautiful cottage. We really enjoyed the time at your place.
Thank you
Radmila

This place is a gem of a retreat. If you’re looking for a ton of bustle and noise everywhere, don’t book here. The lake is so serene and peaceful. It has a walkable path and beautiful views. Just a note: the wifi is not always the sharpest and there is no dedicated desk space- so leave your work at home, unplug and really enjoy Gods creation. Other note- there is no actual stove, but does include a two burner plug in and toaster type oven- so don’t plan on cooking any major meals here- plenty of fridge space and prep space though, so think easy to make meals. The host was so responsive, the instructions were crystal clear and the rest was deep. Thank you for a restorative place to grieve my good friend Pastor Marie. Also, the personal note and my favorite snack was the cherry on top!!
We had a great stay at the Cozy Cottage. The area is beautiful and quiet. Everyone slept great in the comfortable beds.
Great place to stay!
We had another wonderful stay at the cozy cottage! The hosts are very responsive and accommodating. We will be back!

What a wonderful spot!!
We loved Cozy Cottage. It was immediately welcoming, with snuggly beds and a rustic cottage atmosphere! Just perfect for our anniversary trip. We stayed in Windom for a day drive to Mankato, and hope we can come back with our littles during the summer to more fully experience the surrounding area and Fish Lake.
One of the best places I’ve stayed. Very welcoming and very good communication. Hope we get to go back soon
Very nice and cozy place, I didn’t like that the windows were all open without blinds felt like was being watched at times. Overall though very satisfied.
This was our second year in a row staying at Debby's place. This year was just as good as last and already looking forward to our trip next year!

We had a wonderful stay at this cozy cottage. It is a very stylish cottage with appropriate decor. We enjoyed the outdoors, walking to the nearby Fish Lake, the park, small hike to the vineyard etc. It is also a great place for night sky watching with clear skies with very little light pollution.

I highly recommend Debby and the cozy cottage! It is the loveliest little spot. Everything was clean and tidy. The personal touches were my favorite! A handwritten card and treats/snacks upon arrival?! Yes, please!! We’d love to come stay again one day!
what a beautiful place to stay. The little cabin was so quiet and cozy. The lake just outside was also beautiful and relaxing.

Debbie was fantastic! The cottage was cozy, clean, unique and perfect for a family getaway. We loved how close it was to the water. We fished everyday and we caught a huge fish right off the dock! It’s kid friendly and and it had games and books for entertainment along with satellite tv. The kitchen was well equipped and we were able to make homemade meals. Deb was very responsive to all the questions we had and was readily available to help! The view of the lake was spectacular and its clean and a boat launch with public access was within walking distance. The beds were very comfortable and we all agreed we had restful sleep! We will certainly be back for another trip soon. Highly recommend this cottage to everyone!
i want to thank debbie and airbnbthere was some confusion on the days i reserved. it was taken care of quickly and very fair

The Cozy Cottage is a unique, delightful, and charming place to stay. the cottage was very clean and quiet, with many amenities to make it feel like you are staying at a good friend's home. The nearby lake is beautiful with a great little beach. My husband and I enjoyed our weekend stay.
The most amazing and beautiful respite! Cozy and lovely.
Beautiful cabin in an awesome location. Exactly what we were looking for.
This was a stop for us on a long road trip. The accommodations were lovely and the place was spotlessly clean.
Very comfortable place to relax after a busy day! Quiet surroundings. Fun to wake up with the sun streaming in the window and a great view of the lake. Very responsive hosts; easy to work with!

This was the perfect little getaway for 3 empty nest moms. The hosts were very responsive and helpful with our questions. They were gracious to let us keep our kayaks on their property and the lake is beautiful. As described, the fridge is small, so we kept some food in a cooler and made simple meals at the place and ate out the rest. Bergen Bar & Grill and Duffy’s Bar & Grill were both excellent. We had a lovely weekend in a beautiful setting. Would definitely stay again.
This was the second time we stayed here and we still LOVE this place. Our hope is to continue to come back every year.

I had a nice stay, close lake access, lovely walkable area behind the cottage, lots of wildlife. Everything was as described, the fireplace was fantastic for warming up. the queen bed was one of the most comfortable beds I've slept a in!
The kitchen gathers were great, plenty of thing to prepare lunches and dinners.
This was a great place to go for a quick getaway in the winter. Perfect location just right outside of town. Would love to visit sometime in the summer so we can enjoy the lake.
Wonderful place to stay! Hope to stay again. Very nice cozy cottage.
Loved the comfort of the cottage!
Always a great place to stay! Friendly and communicative hosts!
Awesome place!! Great to be back for a second year!! recommend the stay
This residence was spotless! We are grateful for excellent communication from Debby. We would highly recommend staying at this residence.

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was wonderful. The cabin was spotless. It supplied everything you would need for a great getaway, including a floor to ceiling library of books. Conveniently located close to town . We will be returning.
Nice little cottage very close to the lake! Great access to Windom and surrounding area. Very comfy place

Just as cozy and sweet as it looks in the listing. I was pleasantly surprised that we were able to cook a full meal in the kitchenette too, thanks to the large hot plate and toaster oven. I only wished we’d stayed longer!
Great place to stay! Checks all the boxes. Thanks a ton

Great little place with cabin-y charm, directly across from the lake. Was a perfect 'home base' for our winery weekend!
Note that there is no stove (only a double hot plate and a toaster oven) and only a small fridge/freezer, so plan accordingly. Also, the spiral staircase is narrow so navigating it with anything larger than a carryon bag would be a challenge.
A winner. Need a rural escape. This is it. Clean, comfortable, and all the amenities.
A great place to spend family time. Very welcoming and clean. Could not ask for better hosts.

Loved our stay here! The cabin is cozy and comfortable. Close to town. Binder was helpful - personalized lists of restaurants and things to do. Lake was wonderful - warm and lots of fish. Debby went the extra mile to make us feel welcome! Definitely would stay again!

The cozy cottage is absolutely amazing and stunning. You will feel so welcomed and at home. Debby and her family are very responsive with any questions and I would highly recommend this place for a very relaxing getaway!
This is a great place for a get away! We had a lot of fun exploring the area and neighboring towns. The paddle boat was fun and the lake is gorgeous!

This place is truly magical! This is a charming cabin located right off of Fish Lake. It offers easy access to the lake and has a beautiful view! The cabin was very clean and comfortable. The hosts even go above and beyond to provide extra comfort to guests! There were games, books, and equipment to enjoy the lake! We had an outstanding stay and want to book this place again soon!!

Muchas gracias!!!
We have been very confortable, in a wonderful natural environment, thank you very much, we hope to return.
You will not be disappointed! Our family had a wonderful time staying here. We are already talking about coming back this summer.
Looks better than online pictures. We will return to stay again when it’s warmer weather.
As shown in the cottage photos, the only bedroom is upstairs and only accessible via the spiral staircase and the only washroom is on the main floor.

The Cottage was extremely quiet and comfortable. I slept great, which is pretty rare when I travel. I enjoyed the lake-view while eating breakfast, which was a bonus. I would definitely stay here again next time I'm in WIndom.

Super cute and fun getaway spot!! While we stayed here in the winter time and obviously weren’t able to swim or anything, we still had fun playing games by the fireplace, exploring the frozen lake and local town, and overall spending some quality time together in this cozy cottage! It’s a very comfortable place, and communication with the hosts was beyond wonderful!! Would 100% recommend staying here. :)
Loved this place! Absolutely beautiful inside and out. Owners are quick to respond and very accommodating!
Super cute and cozy spot!! Highly recommend, super clean, great communication, and fun spot! Look forward to staying again!
Great Spot!
Great place. Very clean and comfortable. We didn’t get to use the lake, but, great view of it. Very inviting. We will stay again if In the area. Thanks for the welcoming Cozy Cottage!!!
A unique and spotless lodging experience! Close to town and easy to find.

Debby really knows how to host. The space was clean, and the kitchen and bathroom fully stocked. She really thought of everything. Beyond being thorough in her home making, Debby went above and beyond to check in with us and make sure all was well. She let us use her dock for our small fishing boat, and offered us her life jackets and beach towels when we had forgotten our own. We would certainly recommend Debby, and her space. You won’t be dissatisfied.
Super clean and nice place to stay. Winding staircase was so cool. Hosts are very accommodating. … Jalisco Mexican restaurant was good.

We really enjoyed our time at Debby's airbnb. Great location next to Fish Lake and a cozy space. I would recommend to friends and family. We will stay here during all our future stays to Windom if Debby will have us.

This is a great place located a little ways off the highway (it’s about 10-15 mins out). Nearby you have Windom which is a small little town with food and gas options. Extremely clean place to stay, it has a small kitchenette, living room with TV and games, and the bedrooms are up the spiral upstair case. Perfect place if you want a quiet and comfort place to sleep. Note: if you are an animal lover, this might not be for you since there is taxidermy all over the walls.
perfect cozy spot in windom! thoughtful touches, clean, easy check-in & out. highly recommend if you are passing through!

Fish lake is beautiful. Clean and even warm enough to swim in in the high 70 degree temperatures. We loved swimming and kayaking. The cabin was nice and had all the basic things to make for a good stay.

A lovely cottage stay with many cozy touches that felt so welcoming. Communication with Dominique was quick and they were able to accommodate an early check in request. We enjoyed sitting on the lake dock in the mornings, watching fish jump out of the water, so peaceful. Our stay was a little retreat for us so we really appreciated the peace and quiet for reading and quiet conversation. During our stay, a tornado warning sounded and severe weather made for some exciting weather watching. Debby was so kind to walk over to the cottage and invite us to seek shelter with them in their basement! Thank you for a relaxing experience!
Wonderful stay, very clean and homey! Wish we could’ve stayed longer, will definitely be back!

Debby is a terrific host!
The cabin is well appointed, clean, and comfortable. It provided a terrific place to stay for our pilgrimage to the Jeffers Petroglyphs. Wish we had reserved time to put the kayaks to use on the lake!
All around great experience planning to come back

We had such a relaxing week at this lovely cottage! Everything was so clean and nicely decorated. The use of the kayaks and paddle boat was great. Debby and her husband were so hospitable and responsive to our questions, our family of four all enjoyed our time together. The extra cooking options of a toaster oven and electric burners made it very easy to cook what we needed, and we enjoyed the coffee shop and restaurants nearby as well.

Stayed at Chad’s place over the weekend to go to a family event in Sibley. This worked very well for our family which includes 2 (non-shedding) dogs and an infant. Having a full kitchen was a wonderful help. This is a small property but its space was well utilized. Chad was very friendly and quick to respond to our questions. I would be pleased to recommend this property and would happily book there again.

everything was great
my favorite yet
thanks
very nice very happy!
Great place to stay. We enjoyed having the place to ourselves. Within walking distance to downtown and city park. We would definitely stay here again.
My stay in Sibley was great. The house was just what I needed and Chad was very responsive and made sure I knew the check-out procedures. If I’m ever in the area again, I’ll look him up first.
We had a nice stay! Very close to our family!
this was more than advertised and a great responsive host. I liked the area and if I have to return for work again, I hope it is available for me to book.

We chose Chad’s home as a halfway point between SD and NE Wisconsin. The town was nice for a walk, quiet, and easy to find. We ate dinner at Round Lake Winery which was delightful.
Chad described his home accurately with everything we needed for an overnight stay. The home was spotless! The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe.
Great space, well kept and felt more like home than a hotel

Great thanks. The $70 per day cleaning fee is alittle high. I would understand one cleaning fee per visit but I paid $140 in cleaning fees for 2 nights and it was as clean as when I left (minus washing 1 set of sheets)
I did know the fees ahead of time and still booked, because the nightly rate was fairly inexpensive. But I would just add that for a 2 night stay, $140 for cleaning is excessive. But the home was great.
very nice home. I liked the tranquility that felt inside the home. Chad is always on the lookout if you need anything, thank you Chad for letting us into your home
My family and I were really happy to find a place that felt just like home, host is really kind and response to text really fast thank you hope we stop by again soon. ￼
We stopped on our road trip and it was the perfect accommodation for our family. Chad was a great host and if we are in the area again we would stay here.
Very clean and felt right at home. Very comfortable beds and seemed like a safe and quiet neighborhood. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place and town, very quiet. Internet was solid so I was able to work without issue.

Chad's home was clean and comfortable, espcially the beds! We chose Sibley solely because it was halfway between me and my daughter. But, we should have checked out what Sibley had to offer, because breakfast on a Sunday was impossible to find.
However, Chad's neighborhood was great to walk around and we had plenty of space.
